Home.intro: I am a Frontend Developer passionate about creating clean and scalable web applications.

Profile.name: Sujinan Julavittayanukul
Profile.introduction: A passionate frontend web developer with over 2 years of experience in building modern web applications using technologies such as React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and JavaScript. Skilled in designing and developing responsive UI/UX and integrating efficiently with RESTful APIs. Experienced in cross-functional collaboration with UX/UI designers, system analysts, and project managers. Well-versed in Agile/Scrum workflow, with strong problem-solving skills and a fast learning ability for new technologies. Committed to delivering high-quality, user-friendly, and scalable web applications.
